trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA619_02545_SEQ_00<tab>Raubahn wishes to thank you for your service.
TEXT_STMBDA619_02545_SERPENTOFFICER_000_001<tab>I am told one of your comrades was injured during the operation. If there is aught we can do to help, pray do not hesitate to ask.
TEXT_STMBDA619_02545_LYSE_000_005<tab>...Maybe we should speak with General Aldynn. Just in case his men learned something about Krile.

TEXT_STMBDA619_02545_RAUBAHN_000_010<tab><var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>, Commander Hext. Fine work you did today.
TEXT_STMBDA619_02545_RAUBAHN_000_011<tab>After Specula Imperatoris, we needed a resounding victory like this. Thanks to you, Rhalgr's star yet burns bright.
TEXT_STMBDA619_02545_LYSE_000_012<tab>I'm glad, I really am. But you should know that Alisaie was injured in the fighting...
TEXT_STMBDA619_02545_RAUBAHN_000_013<tab>...Regrettable, but I am pleased to hear that she will make a full recovery. Fordola's parting words, on the other hand, ring less favorably in my ears.
TEXT_STMBDA619_02545_RAUBAHN_000_014<tab>But if Zenos wishes to invite us to his so-called “royal hunt,” then this bull would fain accept!
TEXT_STMBDA619_02545_LYSE_000_016<tab>O-Oh, it's nothing really, just that...we're almost to the end, but we've still got to save Krile and do so much more...
TEXT_STMBDA619_02545_RAUBAHN_000_017<tab>We'll find her soon enough. Pipin has his best men scouring the castrum's archives as we speak.

TEXT_STMBDA619_02545_RAUBAHN_000_018<tab>...Listen, Lyse. It will take time for us to fully occupy the castrum and prepare to advance into the Lochs. While we wait, there is something I would like to show you. Both of you.
TEXT_STMBDA619_02545_RAUBAHN_000_019<tab>After all, this may be the last chance we have to catch our breath before the final push.
TEXT_STMBDA619_02545_RAUBAHN_000_021<tab>Then come with me to Radiata. From there we'll need to follow another road south.
TEXT_STMBDA619_02545_LYSE_000_035<tab>I don't think I know this village. It's so small...
TEXT_STMBDA619_02545_RAUBAHN_000_040<tab>Even after all these years, it's still the same... Ah, but I'm getting ahead of myself. You deserve a proper welcome.
